meanings.sent1: Spilling milk on the floor was a bevue.
meanings.sent2: She realized her bevue when she sent the email to the wrong person.
meanings.sent3: The bevue of wearing mismatched socks made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His bevue in the game cost his team the victory.
meanings.sent5: The bevue of forgetting his lines on stage was embarrassing.

meanings.definition: To make a mistake or error.
meanings.sent1: I bevue by adding salt instead of sugar to the cake batter.
meanings.sent2: She tends to bevue when she is nervous.
meanings.sent3: He bevue often, but always learns from his mistakes.
meanings.sent4: The driver bevue by taking the wrong turn.
meanings.sent5: Bevuing in the exam led to a lower grade than expected.
